tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cooking_techniques (technique_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  technique_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  popularity_rating FLOAT,
  user_interaction_count INT);

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  technique_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  feedback_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE feedback ( 
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    user_id INT NOT NULL, 
    interaction_id INT NOT NULL, 
    feedback_text TEXT, 
    rating INT 
);
CREATE TABLE cooking_techniques (technique_id INT PRIMARY KEY, technique_name VARCHAR(255), technique_description TEXT, popularity_score INT)
CREATE TABLE user_interactions (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, technique_id INT, interaction_type ENUM('like', 'dislike', 'comment'), interaction_date TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE user_feedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, technique_id INT, feedback_text TEXT, feedback_date TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE technique_ratings (rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY, technique_id INT, user_id INT, rating_score FLOAT, rating_date TIMESTAMP)
